Name: IPROSLA
Description: This corpus contains three sets of data. The first is a set of longitudinal data of deaf children from deaf and hearing parents that has been collected at the UvA since the late 1980s. The second is a new collection of longitudinal data collected at the RU from hearing and deaf children of deaf parents (2008â€“2020). Thirdly, data collected in an educational context by Nini Hoiting at the Kentalis Guyot school.
